Package Details:

  • 4G high-speed data 
  • Unlimited local calls and Text
  • Operates on Vodafone
  • 1000 International Minutes in - (Bangladesh, Japan, Philippines, USA, Vietnam, Thailand, India, Singapore, China, UK, Ireland, North Korea, France, Italy, Greece, Portugal, Spain, Austria, Canada, Pakistan, Malaysia, New Zealand, Indonesia, Sri Lanka, Hong Kong).
